txt.en:
Frethi is clearly injured from the Shadowed King's attack.

'You must… return to King Thorin! Please! He must know of what happened here, and the Shadowed King's threats! I will recover, just go!'

<rgb=#FF0000>You will swiftly travel to Erebor!</rgb>
Instance: The Stone Returned
The time has come to reunite the five stones. Their purpose will finally be revealed!

Frethi's panicked words shake you to your core. A haze you did not realize was present suddenly lifts from your mind. A powerful feeling of dread washes over you.

'What are you doing? You cannot release the Nameless! Durin the Deathless himself sealed it away!'

He notices your confused expression and takes a step back to explain.

'Listen, I translated the rest of the runes, and they are a dire warning! They say that returning the stones will release a being known as the Shadowed King!'

Suddenly the ground beneath you begins to shake.

'It has begun! Look out!'
'[placeholder], what have you done?!'
'He is coming!'
Look around with Frethi
'I am released.'
'Thank you, my loyal servant.'
'Throkhâr lives still. I will find you, my master...'
'And I will enact your vengeance upon the children of the Valar!'
Talk to Frethi
'Ack! No! He is escaping!'
The time has finally come.\n\nYou must place the Secret Stone on the fifth pedestal.
Something is wrong. What just happened?\n\nYou should talk to Frethi.
He has been released!\n\nWitness his might!
Place the Secret Stone on its pedestal
TBD
<rgb=#8A2BE2>Kill Frethi</rgb>
Witness the release of the Shadowed King

'What in Durin's name have we found here? There are no records of this place! I had thought the only thing that predated Durin IV's time down this deep was the Stair itself, but... perhaps we were wrong! Let us look around!'
